name: com.reachcloud.metaverse-cloud-sdk
description:
The Unity SDK for the Metaverse Cloud Engine

# Changelog

## 2.200.38
- Enhance UploadBundles method in AssetEditor to support authentication error retries. Update method signature to async for improved handling of upload operations.

Updated on October 12, 2025

## 2.200.37
- Update MetaverseCloudEngine.ApiClient.dll and MetaverseCloudEngine.Common.dll binaries to latest versions

Updated on October 11, 2025

## 2.200.36
- Enhance LoginStore initialization and token management with improved logging and error handling. Implement a robust preference flushing mechanism to ensure data integrity during assembly reloads.

Updated on October 11, 2025

## 2.200.35
- Refactor token handling in LoginStore for immediate persistence and cleanup

Updated on October 11, 2025

## 2.200.34
- Update package version to 2.200.33 and enhance session suffix persistence using EditorPrefs

Updated on October 11, 2025

## 2.200.33
- Fix token persistence issue: Use EditorPrefs instead of SessionState to persist session suffix across editor restarts

Updated on October 11, 2025

## 2.200.32
- Use Unity's built-in BuildSettings.iPhone icon for iOS platform

Updated on October 11, 2025

## 2.200.31
- Update iOS platform icon with new design

Updated on October 11, 2025

## 2.200.30
- Add debugging for update dialog and improve changelog display
- Fix Meta icon for AndroidVR platform in Platform Optimization Options

Updated on October 11, 2025

## 2.200.29
- Update platform icons for AndroidVR and add new meta images

Updated on October 11, 2025
author: Reach Cloud
